show_name: Case Closed: Captured in Her Eyes (movie 4)
other_title: Detective Conan: Capturado en sus ojos (Spanish)
Detective Conan: Captured in Her Eyes
Detective Conan: Solo nei suoi occhi (Italian)
Detektiv Conan: Der Killer in ihren Augen (German)
Meitantei Conan: Hitomi no Naka no Ansatsusha (Japanese)
名偵探柯南 瞳孔中的暗殺者 (Chinese (Taiwan))
名探偵コナン 瞳の中の暗殺者 (Japanese)
명탐정 코난 극장판: 눈동자 속의 암살자 (Korean)
plot: A series of murders have occured with police officers as victims. One of the officers is shot right in front of Ran's eyes, and the shock of the incident causes Ran to lose her memory of everyone and everything around her. Now Conan must help Ran regain her lost memories, while also protecting her from the muderer, who is targeting Ran for witnessing the crime.
ending_theme: "あなたかいるから (Anata ga Iru Kara)" by Miho Komatsu
